title: What are the aims of information and communication technology in teaching? - Quora

response.answer_text: The list would be endless. Concept visualisation through Augmented reality and Virtual reality. Realtime interactive sessions (video chats and voice chats). Availability and accessibility of knowledge and study materials on demand. Expanded social reach. See how apps like Baidu and khan academy are going to lead the history of modern education (especially in times of pandemics like COVID-19).
